title: Bellydance with Jillina - Vol 3 Drum Solo Choreography
description: In this first of three DVDs featuring a complete performance routine, Jillina will focus on the most integral part of a show the Entrance. Through technique breakdown, drilling, and step by step combination instruction, Jillina will build up to an exciting Egyptian Fusion choreography that includes various rhythms and a mini drum solo. You will learn graceful turns, intricate traveling steps and classic bellydance movements sprinkled with JillinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s signature style. Chapters include: Warm up, Technique (break down & drills), Combinations, Choreography and Live Performance.
